sub_topics.title: Lijina lyamuthu ivene (One's own name)
competences: Kulivuluka majina avo vavene (To say their own names)
Kwitava kumajina avo mukwoloka (To introduce themselves by name correctly)

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi vetave kumajina avo kuhichila mukwolola mavoko, kwitava ngwavo yami uno, kusakwilila, kulondezeza usocha kufuma hachihela chimwe nakuya hachihela chikwavo nge vanavasanyika
Sanyika majina avalongi kukavangiza ndondelo chipwe chiku
learner_steps: Vatwame chipwe vemane mumujingulule, valikungulwile hamwe chipwe mumukana
Kutumbuka
Kumbata chuma (ngunja) nakuchihaka mumwe (chimbokishi)
Kulamika muvwimbimbi halivaya
Kusakwilila
Kwitava nakuhanjika ngwenyi, (yami uno, mwane, nguneza)
Valisanyike majina nakulitaviza mwavo mwavo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity helps learners identify and say their own names as they are called in class. Learners practice introducing themselves through various activities including jumping, passing objects, singing, greeting, and saying their names.

instructional_blocks.hook: Lijina lyove yove hiya? (What is your name?)
teacher_steps: Hana chitalilo kuzachisa vihula nakumbulwilo yacho: Lijina lyove yove hiya?.... Lijina lyami yami Chilombo. Yove hiya? ……Yami Chilombo. Vakuvuluka ngwavo yovehiya? Vanguvuluka ngwavo Chilombo
Linga ngocho navalongi vamwe. Kaha nawa, zachisa myaso mangana uzamikise kunangakana chavo
Lweza valongi vakuhule vihula kaha yove nawa kumbulula mwakwoloka
learner_steps: Vavali-vavali nge omu mwavalweza mulongeshi chipwe vavene navalihwojola nakulikumbulula vihula vyakufwanange
Lijina lyove yove hiya?.... Lijina lyami yami Chilombo
Yoveya? …………… Yami Chilombo
Vakuvuluka ngwavo yoveya?...... Vanguvuluka ngwavo Chilombo
Valivuluke majina mu jijila jakulisezaseza: Kulamika tuthachikijilo twamajina avo halivaya
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners practice saying their names through questions and answers in pairs. They learn to ask 'What is your name?' and respond appropriately, reinforcing name recognition through repetition and song.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic focuses on helping learners identify and correctly say their own names through introduction activities. The activities emphasize oral language development, social interaction, and building confidence in self-identification.

questions: Can learners introduce themselves correctly by name?
Can learners say their own names clearly?
Can learners stand in a circle or line as instructed?
Can learners introduce themselves using various methods: jumping, passing objects, singing, greeting?
Can learners ask and answer 'What is your name?' correctly in pairs?
Can learners say their names in various ways including singing?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Kukwata mukanda mukwoloka (Pre-reading - Holding books correctly)
competences: Kuthachikiza mwakukwachila mukanda (Demonstrate how to hold a book)
Kukwata mukanda mukwoloka (Hold a book correctly)
Kutumbika mukanda mukwoloka (Open a book correctly)
Kufukununa mapepa mukwoloka (Turn pages correctly)

teacher_steps: Longesa mikanda yayivulu ize muzachisa navalongi yakufwana nge: Mikanda yamivwimbimbi yatunyama, vathu, vyuma vyamuzuvo na mitondo
Pangila mikanda kuli valongi
Haka mangana kuli vino hakukwata mukanda: Mukuchikulula, Muuhengelo, Mukufulumika
Tala valongi muka vanakwate mukanda mukwoloka
Hulisa valongi nge vanakwate mikanda mujila yakwoloka tahi chiku kaha mwomwo ika? Nge kavakwachile kanawako kaha valumbunwine
Mivwimbimbi yatela kupwa yakwimika kechi yakuchikululako
learner_steps: Vakwate mukanda wakufwika chipwe wakufukununa oku vanatwame ha chisalo: Mahinji vanatandavala, Mahinji vanakoneka kunyima, Mahinji analisalika kulutwe
Vakwate mukanda wakufwika chipwe wakufukununa oku vanatwame ha ndesiki: Hakuhaka minguza, Muwatela kupwa mahinji, Muwatela kutwama mukanda ha ndesiki
Vakwate mukanda wakufwika chipwe wakufukununa oku vanatwame ha chitwamo cha likumbu: Hakuhaka minguza, Mwakukwachila mukanda
Vakwate mukanda wakufwika chipwe wakufukununa oku vanemana: Mwakukwachila mukanda
Kumbata mukanda wakufukununa (nalivoko limwe chipwe avali), wakufwika (haseteko ya mbunda, haseteko ya thulo)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches learners the correct way to hold books in different positions (sitting at desk, sitting at table, sitting on chair, standing) and whether the book is open or closed. Proper book handling is foundational for developing reading readiness.

teacher_steps: Hana chitalilo kuli valongi mwakukwachila mukanda mukwoloka uli: Hamesa chipwe handesiki, Hamahinji, Mumavoko
learner_steps: Vatumbike mukanda mukwoloka kwanuka jijila jamwakukwachila mukanda valinangulanga lyehi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners practice opening books correctly based on how they are holding them, reinforcing proper book handling techniques.

teacher_steps: Pangila mikanda kuli valongi
Lweza valongi vafukunune mukanda lipepa limwe limwe swi nakusongo mumeso akuunda
Tala valongi vali nakufukununa mapepa mujijila yakuluwa

Lumbunwina valongi jijila jakwoloka jakufukunwinamo mapepa: Kufuma kuchilyo nakutwala kuchimoswe, Lipepa limwe limwe halwola, Kufuma kwilu yamumbango yakuchilyo, Kufuma kwishi yambango yakuchilyo, Kanda kuzachisa maleji hakufukununa mapepa
learner_steps: Vafukunune mapepa mujila yakwoloka
Valumbunune vili mumukanda kuhichila mu: Kukwata mukanda mukwoloka, Kutumbika mukanda mujila yakwoloka, Kufukununa mapepa amukanda mukwoloka
Kavatela kuzachisa maleji hakufukununa mapepako
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity focuses on teaching learners the correct way to turn book pages - one at a time, from right to left, without using saliva or crumpling pages. Proper page turning is essential for book care and reading development.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section teaches foundational book handling skills including how to hold books correctly in various positions and how to turn pages properly. These skills prepare learners for future reading activities.

questions: Can learners hold a book correctly while sitting at a desk (feet flat, behind, or to side)?
Can learners hold a book correctly while sitting at a table (without resting elbows)?
Can learners hold a book correctly while sitting on a chair?
Can learners hold a book correctly while standing?
Can learners hold an open book with one or both hands?
Can learners hold a closed book at waist or chest level?
Can learners open a book correctly based on how they are holding it?
Can learners turn pages correctly (one at a time, right to left)?
Do learners avoid using saliva when turning pages?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Twamiso (Pre-writing - Posture)
competences: Kutwama mwakwoloka (To sit correctly)
Kulilongesa twamiso yambwende (To demonstrate good posture)

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi vatwame mutwamiso oyo vathachikiza
Talishisa nakumona jitwamiso valongi nava twama
Hana chitalilo nakulumbununa twamiso yambwende: Vatela voloke, Mavoko apwenga hamesa chipwe handesiki, Vipundo vilyate hamavu oku vinoloka
learner_steps: Vatwame mutwamiso oyo vathachikiza
Vasolole jitwamiso jakulisezaseza
Vatale twamiso mwavalweza mulongeshi yambwende: Vatela voloke, Mavoko apwenga hamesa chipwe handesiki, Vipundo vilyate hamavu oku vinoloka
Vahakeko kutwama cha ndumba nanjamba, chamwaza nechi chachipi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches learners proper sitting posture for writing - sitting upright with arms on the table and feet on the ground. Good posture is essential for developing writing skills and preventing fatigue.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section focuses on teaching correct sitting posture in preparation for writing activities. Proper posture supports better concentration and writing development.

questions: Can learners sit in correct posture (upright, arms resting on table, knees bent with feet on ground)?
Can learners practice sitting both tall and short, wide and narrow while maintaining good posture?

sub_topics.title: Masepa (Places)
competences: Kuvuluka majina amasepa javo (To say the names of their places)

instructional_blocks.hook: Achi twame ushinganyeke nge muwana muthu nakolo najivwi kumutwe thoo. Atwama kaha ukhawenyi, atambukaukhawenyi, vyuma vyosena alinga ukhawenyi, Alihanjikisa ukhawenyi. Kaha mushinganyeka ngwove ika?
teacher_steps: Hana chitalilo kuzachisa vihula nakumbulwilo: Sepalyove lijina lyenyi ikhiye hiya?...sepalyami lijina lyenyi ikhiye Mafwo. Sepalyove ikhiye hiya? … ikhiyeMafwo
Lweza valongi valihule vihula khana venevi vavali vavali. Valongi nawa vahulisemulongeshi, kaha yove mulongeshi ukumbululemukwoloka

Lumbunwina valongi jijila jikwavo jakukumbulwilamojakufwana nge eji: Kulamika tuthachikijilo twamasepa javo halivaya, Kukwata mukwavo longi kulivoko nakumuvuluka lijina, Kumeneka mukwavo longi halijina lyenyi
Linga ngocho navalongi vamwe. kahanawa, Zachisa myaso mangana uzamikise kunangakana chavalongi
learner_steps: Vatela kulingamo mwavomwavo jino - Vavalivavali: Sepalyove lijina lyenyi ikhiye hiya?...sepalyami lijina lyenyi ikhiye Mafwo. Sepalyove ikhiye hiya? … ikhiye mafwo
Azanga ulombo muka, chihemo muka, kulya muka navyuma vikwavo nawa kwesekesa navavene valongi
Hiya sepa lyove ku: kushikola, kwimbo, kuchechi
Kulamika tuthachikijilo twamasepa javo halivaya
Kukwata mukwavo longi kulivoko nakumuvulukalijina. Kumeneka mukwavo longi halijina lyenyi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches learners to identify and say the names of places they go to, such as school, home, and church. It develops vocabulary related to familiar places in their community.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic helps learners learn the names of familiar places like school, home, and church, building their environmental awareness and vocabulary.

questions: Can learners say the names of their places correctly when asking the teacher or another learner?
Can learners answer correctly: 'What is the name of your place? My place is called...'?
Can learners identify places they go: to church, to programs, to eat, etc.?
Can learners identify their place as: school, home, church?
Can learners sing about the names of their places?
Can learners hold another learner's hand and say their place name?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Kwivwilila kumijimbu yayashi (Pre-reading - Listening to short stories)
competences: Kwivwilila kumijimbu yayashi nakukumbulula vihula (To listen to short stories and answer questions)

instructional_blocks.hook: Achishinganyeke nge muwana muthu wamukulwane nambate chisaji chenyi chamijimbu. ana kwivwilila kumijimbu oku alimulizavu lyavathu vanakuneha vyema. kaha kumuhula ngwavo ambulula ovyo unakwivwilila mwavyambulula? Phimbi, mwomwo ali muvyema
teacher_steps: Watela kupwa namikanda yakulisezaseza ili namivwimbimbi yavathu, tunyama, mitondo navyuma vyakulisezaseza
Sakulaho umwe owo mutangila valongi, kaha lweza valongi vashimutwile hamivwimbimbi ili hamukanda khana
Hakamangana kuli evi navashimutwila valongi: Hali muthu, Hali mutondo, Halikawa, navikwavo
Hula valongi vakulweze vyuma vanashinganyeka vili mumukanda
Hakako lushimbi ngwove: Twivwililenu kumujimbu uli muno mumukanda. Tulihulikenu kulu mwomwo nakupwa vihula hanyima chipwe omu natutanganga uno mujimbu
Tangila mujimbu valongi
Mwimikila imikila mangana umone nge vanakwivwilila
Hula vihulula vyakufwana nge: Mwashinganyeka ngwenu vyumamuka navikavaho? Kahamwalinga ngachili? Mutwe muka wachihande vanatuhane?
learner_steps: Kwivwilila kumujimbu oku vanatwame hachisalo: Okuvanatono, Oku vanafwiki hameso, Oku vana savala chakupulumana, Oku vanemana mumujingulule
Kukumbulula vihula
Vatela kukumbulula vihula oku: Vanatono, vanafwiki hameso, vana savala chakupulumana, vanemana mumujingulule
Mumazavu amandende vatela kulilweza mijimbu yayihi nakulihula vihula
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops listening skills by having learners listen to short stories and answer comprehension questions in various seating arrangements. It builds foundational literacy skills.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section focuses on developing listening comprehension skills through storytelling, which is essential for literacy development.

questions: Can learners listen to stories while sitting at desk in various positions (close, facing forward, apart, in circle)?
Can learners answer questions about the story they heard?
Can learners maintain attention during storytelling?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kuvwovuwisa minwe (Pre-writing - Finger exercises)
competences: Kuhema chipwe kulinga milimo yakuvwovuwisa minwe (To do or perform finger strengthening exercises)

instructional_blocks.hook: Nge wapwanga nakutambuka kaha muwana mukweze walunga, navwale kahanawa nakavwanda zululu. Mumumona natwame hamesa namapepa amwaza alinakusoneka. Omu muheta mwakamwihi, mumuwana nakwate sonekeso yenyi naminwe yosena itanu. Kaha mushinganyeka ngwove ika? Minwe yenyi kayechi yayivwovuko
teacher_steps: Kungulula unonga uze navahemesa valongi
Hana valongi unonga vaumbe chose nocho nava sak a

Talishisa umone vyuma muka valinakuumba kaha valweze jino vaumbe vyakufwana nge: Jishepu (tilayango, seko, sikweya, lekitango), tunyama (vahembo, vamumusenge), vyuma vyakulisezaseza (kapu, lilonga, ndeho, sipuni)
learner_steps: Vatela kuhema naunonga mujijila jajivulu jakufwana nge kuumba: jishepu (tilayango, seko,sikweya, lekitango), tunyama (vahembo, vamumusenge), vyuma vyakulisezaseza (kapu, lilonga, ndeho, sipuni)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity strengthens finger muscles through clay molding activities, preparing learners for writing. Creating various shapes and objects develops fine motor control.

teacher_steps: Haka valongi mu mazavu amandende chipwe vavali vavali
Mumazavu avo, lumbika vyumavyavivulu vyakufwana nge: malolwa, usanga, makunde, jimbatani navifwiko vyakumitumwa
Valweze valongi vavihandunune nakuvihaka mumazavu. Atela kupwa mazavu a: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani Kuzachisa minwe
learner_steps: Mumazavu avo vatela kuhandununa vyumanavahane mulongeshi nakuvihaka mumazavu a: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani Kuzachisa minwe
Valongi vatela cheka kulava evi vyumanakuvihaka mumakapa nakuvifumisamo chimwechimwe kuzachisa minwe. Likapa lya: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity uses sorting and handling small objects to develop fine motor skills and finger dexterity, essential for writing readiness.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section develops finger strength and fine motor skills through molding and manipulating small objects.

questions: Can learners mold shapes (triangle, circle, square, rectangle) with clay?
Can learners mold animals (birds, insects) with clay?
Can learners mold objects (cup, spoon, plate, knife) with clay?
Can learners sort objects into groups (cloths, beads, pebbles, seeds, buttons) using fingers?
Can learners put items in bags and take them out one by one using fingers?

sub_topics.title: Majina avathanga (Names of family members)
competences: Kuvuluka majina avathanga yayindende (To say the names of close family members)

teacher_steps: Talisa mivwimbimbi valongi kuzachisa chati chipwe mukanda walongi
Hula valongi vavuluke vivanamono hamuvwimbimbi
Vatela kuvuluka mazu akufwana nge: Tata, Mama, Yaya, Songo yami
learner_steps: Vatale hamivwimbimbi nakuvuluka viliho oku: Vanakuzundula mavoko, Vanatwame mu mujingulule, Vanemana mu mulongo
Valilweze ngwavo ngwatwama na: Tata, Mama, Yaya, Songo yami
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity introduces learners to names of family members through picture identification.

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi vapwenga vavali vavali
Valweke valilweze vathu vatwama navo kwimbo
Vatela valilweze ngwavo ngwatwama na: Tata, Mama, Yaya, Songo yami
Ivwilila valongi omu navashimutwila havathu vatwama navo
learner_steps: Vavali vavali vashimutwile nakulilweza vathu vatwama navo
Valilweze ngwavo ngwatwama na: Tata, Mama, Yaya, Songo yami
Umwe umwe alweze vakwavo vivanashimutwila
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners practice talking about their family members in pairs.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic teaches learners to identify and name close family members like father, mother, older siblings, and friends.

questions: Can learners look at pictures and say what's there (raising hands, standing in circle, standing in line)?
Can learners talk in pairs about who they live with?
Can learners say who they live with: Father, Mother, Older sibling, My friend?
Can each learner tell their partner what they talked about?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Ndondelo yakutanga (Pre-reading - Direction sequences)
competences: Kulondezeza kutanga kufuma kuchimoswe nakutwala kuchilyo (To follow direction from left to right)
Kulondezeza kutanga kufuma kwilu nakutwala kwishi (To follow direction from top to bottom)

teacher_steps: Lweka valongi vemane mumulongo
Valweke vachaule kufuma kuchimoswe nakuya chilyo oku vanakwimba mwaso (chimoswe, chilyo) nakutwalililaho likha
Imana kulivaya ufunjike mufunda kufuma kuchimoswe nakuya kuchilyo. Linga ngocho: mupeho, hamavu
Lumbika mukole chipwe wanda wausuku mumbango ili kuchimoswe chava longi, umwe umwe ajingunune wanda chipwe mukole oku ali nakutambuka kufuma kuchimoswe nakuya kuchilyo
learner_steps: Vemane mumulongo nge omu mulongeshi navalweze
Vachaule kufuma kuchimoswe nakuya kuchilyo oku vanakwimba mwaso wa, (chimoswe, chilyo) nakutwalililaho likha
Vakavangize mifunda mwafunjika mulongeshi ha livaya,mupeho nahamavu kuzachisa meso
Umwe umwe ajingunune wanda chipwe mukole oku vali nakutambuka kufuma kuchimoswe nakuya kuchilyo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches left-to-right directional movement, foundational for reading.

teacher_steps: Imana kulivaya ufunjike mufunda kufuma kwilu nakuya kwishi. Linga ngocho: Mupeho, hamavu
Twala valongi haweluka muze mwakuhemena
Valweze vahemene ha silayindi vashikumukenga kufuma helu nakwiza mwishi
Zamikisa ngwove vatela kutalishisa omu vakwavo vali nakusulumuka kufuma helu nakwiza mwishi
learner_steps: Vakavangize mifunda mwafunjika mulongeshi ha livaya,mupeho nahamavu kuzachisa meso kufuma kwilu nakwiza mwishi
Vayenga haweluka kuchihela cha kuhemena
Vahemene hasilayindi vashikumukenga kufuma helu nakwiza mwishi
Vatela kutalishisa omu vakwavo vali nakusulumuka kufuma helu nakwiza mwishi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches top-to-bottom directional movement through drawing and sliding activities.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section teaches directional concepts (left-to-right, top-to-bottom) essential for reading readiness.

questions: Can learners stand in line as teacher guided?
Can learners walk from left to right while singing the song?
Can learners copy lines teacher drew on board, in air and on ground?
Can each learner pick up cloth or bead while walking from left to right?
Can learners copy lines from top to bottom using eyes?
Can learners go outside to play area?
Can learners play on slide going from top to bottom?
Can learners observe how friends come down from top to bottom?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kuvwovuwisa minwe (Pre-writing - Finger exercises continued)
competences: Kuzata milimo ya kuvwovuwisa minwe (To do finger strengthening activities)

teacher_steps: Kungulula unonga uze navahemesa valongi
Hana valongi unonga vaumbe chose nocho navasaka

Talishisa umone vyuma muka valinakuumba kaha valweze jino vaumbe vyakufwana nge: jishepu (tilayango, seko,sikweya, lekitango), tunyama (vahembo, vamumusenge), vyuma vyakulisezaseza (kapu, lilonga, ndeho, sipuni)
learner_steps: Vatela kuhema naunonga mujijila jajivulu jakufwana nge kuumba: jishepu (tilayango, seko,sikweya, lekitango), tunyama (vahembo, vamumusenge), vyuma vyakulisezaseza (kapu, lilonga, ndeho, sipuni)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Repeated activity from earlier topic to continue developing finger strength through clay molding.

teacher_steps: Haka valongi mu mazavu amandende chipwe vavali vavali
Mumazavu avo, lumbika vinoma vyavivulu vyakufwana nge: malolwa, usanga, makunde, jimbatani navifwiko vyakumitumwa
Valweze valongi vavihandunune kuvihaka muma zavu. Atela kupwa mazavu a: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani Kuzachisa minwe
learner_steps: Mumazavu avo vatela kuhandununa vinoma navahane mulongeshi nakuvihaka mumazavu a: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani Kuzachisa minwe
Valongi vatela cheka kulava evi vinoma nakuvihaka mumakapa nakuvifumisamo chimwechimwe kuzachisa minwe. Likapa lya: vifwiko, malolwa, mikoswa, usanga, jimbatani
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Continued practice with sorting and handling small objects to strengthen fine motor skills.

sub_topics.short_notes: Repeated pre-writing activities to continue developing finger dexterity and fine motor control.

questions: Can learners sort objects and put in groups (cloths, beads, pebbles, seeds, buttons)?
Can learners put items in bags and take out one by one using fingers?

sub_topics.title: Majina avilyo vyamujimba wa muthu (Names of human body parts)
competences: Kuvuluka majina avilyo vyamujimba wamuthu (To say names of human body parts)

instructional_blocks.hook: Kajingili kakandende, kwivwa lizu lyamuthu ngwenyi, mwiji mukawo!! Hahaze vene sepa lyove hikuhosomoka kwilu nakuholokela mumavu lyachi. Aputukile kulila oku alinakulikwata kumatwitwi nakumahinji. Chilyo muka chamujimba wasepa lyove unashinganyeka alikolesele?
teacher_steps: Imba mwaso navalongi wakuvuluka vilyo vyamujimba wamuthu (ou mutwe, ndondondondondondondo…)
Lweza valongi vatwame hamavu mumujingulule
Mbata kandoli chipwe chati yamuvwimbimbi wamujimba wamuthu usolole kuli valongi
Valweze vatongole vilyo vyakufwana nge; mutwe, lihinji, livoko, liso oku: Vana Kungongola tumitondo, Vana kusakwila, Vana kutumbuka, Valina kunengula kumutwe
Mona ngwove valongi vanakutongola majina avilyo vyakuwelukawamujimba wamuthu mukwoloka
Lweza valongi vanungejeke pazo yavilyo vyamujimba wamuthu
learner_steps: Kwimba mwaso hamwe namulongeshi wakuvuluka vilyo vyamujimbawamuthu (ou mutwe, ndondondondondondondo…)
Vatwame hamavu mumujingulule
Vatale hali kandoli chipwe hachati vamone viliho
Vatongole vilyo vyakufwana nge; mutwe, lihinji, livoko, liso oku: Vana Kungongola tumitondo, Vana kusakwila, Vana kutumbuka, Valina kunengula kumutwe
Vatongole majina avilyo vyamujimba wamuthu mukwoloka
Vanungejeke pazo yavilyo vyamujimba wamuthu vavali vavali
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches learners to identify and name basic body parts through songs, movements, and visual aids.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic introduces learners to names of basic human body parts like head, leg, arm, and eye.

questions: Can learners sing song about naming body parts?
Can learners identify body parts (head, leg, arm, eye) when: shaking sticks, greeting, jumping, nodding head?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Visonejeka (Pre-reading - Pictures)
competences: Kumona na kwinyika visonejeka vyakulisezaseza (To see and recognize various pictures)

teacher_steps: Longesa mivwimbimbi yakulisezaseza hajikhati
Talisa valongi mivwimbimbi yakulisezaseza ili hajikhati
Sweka jikhati muvihela vyakulisezaseza mushikola
Hula valongi vatonde muvwimbimbi muvalweza oku vali nakwimba mwaso wakutonda tonda (tumutondetondee-e mamalelo tumuhane mwoyo)
Yatela kupwa mivwimbimbi yakufwana nge: Yavathu, Yavasona chipweyavivumo, Jinambala, Khulusu
Lweza valongi kukavangiza lushimbi luno: Vaseze khati yakuluwa muchihela chayo,yakwolokavayimbate nakuyisolola kuli vakwavo valongi kaha vamusangejeke
learner_steps: Vatale mivwimbimbi yakulisezaseza ili hajikhati
Vatonde mivwimbimbi mulongeshi mwavalweza
Vatela kutonda mivwimbimbi yakufwana nge: Yavathu, Yavasona chipwevivumo, Jinambala, Khulusu
Vatela kukavangiza lushimbi luze navalweze mulongeshi: Vaseze khati yakuluwa muchihela chayo,yakwolokavayimbate nakuyisolola kuli vakwavo valongi kaha vamusangejeke
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops visual recognition skills by having learners observe and identify various pictures.

teacher_steps: Longesa jikhati javasona vavandende navaze vavanene
Talisa valongi mwakupanjikila vasona: Hawanda, Hamavu, Hachati, Halivaya
learner_steps: Vapanjike jikhati javasona kutesa nomu navalweze mulongeshi: Hawanda, Hamavu, Hachati, Halivaya
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches spatial organization and classification skills through arranging picture charts.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section develops visual discrimination and recognition skills through picture observation and arrangement activities.

questions: Can learners look at various pictures on charts and identify what they see (people, animals/sounds, numbers, clothes)?
Can learners arrange animal charts as teacher showed (on cloth, on ground, on chart, on board)?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kukwata sonekeso kanawa (Pre-writing - Holding writing tools correctly)
competences: Kukwata kanawa vyakusonekesa vyakulisezasesa (To hold various writing tools correctly)

teacher_steps: Imba mwaso navalongi wakulizanga mwakukwachila vyakusonekesa
Lweza valongi volojole minwe
Lweza valongi mwakukwachila vyakusonekesa mujindondelo jakulisezaseza jakufwana nge eji jili hamuvwimbimbi
learner_steps: Vembenga mwaso namulongeshiwakulizanga mwakukwachila vyakusonekesa
Volojole minwe
Valondezeze jindondelo mwavalweza mulongeshi jamwakukwachila vyakusonekesa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches proper pencil/writing tool grip through songs and demonstration.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section focuses on teaching correct grip for holding writing tools.

questions: Can learners stretch their fingers?
Can learners follow the ways teacher showed for holding writing tools?

sub_topics.title: Majina avizachiso vya wenyembo hakanda (Names of items used at home)
competences: Kuvuluka majina avinoma vyawenyembo vyakulisezaseza vize vathu veji kuzachisanga ha hakhanda (To say names of various household items)

teacher_steps: Tanjika vinoma vyahakhanda hamesa chipwe lamika chati yamivwimbimbi ha mbango
Hula valongi vakulweze vivanakumona ha chati chipwe ha mesa
Vyatela kupwa vinoma chipwe mivwimbimbi yakufwana nge: Vyamutupete twamuzuvo (muchisambwe, mwakushikamina, mwakusavala na mwakulila), Vyakuwahisa nacho hakhanda, Vyakuzachisa kumande
learner_steps: Vatalishise vinoma ha mesa chipwe hachati yamivwimbimbi nakuvitongola majina avyo

Vatongole vinoma vyakufwana nge: Vyamutupetetwamuzuvo (muchisambwe,(lilonga,ndeho..) mwakushikamina,(chitwamo,TV…) mwakusavala(muhela,lipayi…)namwakulila(mesa,chitwamo…), Vyakuwahisa nacho hakhanda(lukombo,hala…), Vyakuzachisa kumande.(ngimbu, litemo…)
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity introduces learners to names of common household items found in different rooms.

teacher_steps: Longesa milimo yize valongi navazata kuzachisa vinoma yakufwana nge: Kukomba, Kulondezeza kulima, Kulondezeza kuteleka
learner_steps: Vazate milimo ino kuzachisa vinoma: Kukomba, Kulondezeza kulima, Kulondezeza kuteleka
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners practice role-playing household activities using the items they learned about.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic teaches learners to identify and name common household items and their uses in different rooms.

questions: Can learners observe items on table or picture chart and identify their names?
Can learners identify items from different room types and their uses?
Can learners do activities using items: hoeing, pretending to farm, pretending to cook?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Vivumo (Pre-reading - Sounds)
competences: Kulondezeza vivumo vyakufuma kuvyuma vyakuli handununa (To recognize sounds from various objects)

instructional_blocks.hook: Achishinganyeke nge muwana muthu wamukulwane nambate chisaji chenyi chamijimbu
teacher_steps: Veta hachuma chize nachivuma(ngezo, ngoma, kapyololo)
Hula valongi vakulweze vivanevu
Haka vyuma vyavivumo hachisalo chipwe muchihela ocho unawahisa
Lweza valongi vahemese vyumakhana.(ngoma, chichakachaka, phala...)
Valweze vavuluke vivumo vanakwivwa.(ndindindi, chakachaka, polilo...)
Vahule vihula vyakufwana nge: 'ngoma yavumu ngachili?....ndindindi', 'nyi ngezo nawa?' ....ngengenge
Sweka vyuma muvihela vyakulisezaseza
Hana khati yamuvwimbimbi kuli longihilongi
Valweze vavitonde, nge vanachiwane valondezeze chuvumo chachuma khana
learner_steps: Vahemese vyuma vyavivumo hachisalo chipwe muchihela vanavawahishila
Valondezeze vivumo vanakwivwa.(ndindindi, chakachaka, polilo...)
Vakumbulule vihula vyakufwana nge: 'ngoma yavumu ngachili?.........ndindindi', 'nyi ngezo nawa?' ..ngengenge....)
Kuzachisa jikhati jamuvwimbimbi,vatonde vyuma nasweke mulongeshi.kaha omu navaviwana,valondezeze vivumo vyavyuma khana
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops auditory discrimination skills by having learners identify and match sounds to their sources.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section develops listening and sound recognition skills through identification of object sounds.

questions: Can learners play with sound-making objects?
Can learners identify sounds they hear (boom boom, rattle rattle, gong gong)?
Can learners answer questions about how instruments sound?
Can learners find objects and identify their sounds?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kusoneka jiphatani (Pre-writing - Making patterns)
competences: Kusoneka jiphatani jajashi (To make simple patterns)

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi volojole minwe oku valinakwimba mwaso wakutambukisa minwe.(twingo twingo)
Kungejeka vinoma vyakuzachisa hakusoneka jiphatani
Lweza valongi vasoneke jiphatani kuzachisa vinoma vyakulisezaseza
Mona ngwove valongi vanakusoneka jiphatani kuzachisa vinoma vyakulisezaseza: Hamavu, Hamapepa, Hamesa, Halivaya
Talishisa umone jiphatani muka valinakusoneka, kaha valweze vasoneke jiphatani nge jino: jishepu (tilayango, seko,sikweya, lekitango), mifunda (zikizaki, wamakhanya, wakwoloka, wakulisetwojoka… )
learner_steps: Volojole minwe oku valinakwimba mwaso
Vasoneke jiphatani kuzachisa vinoma vyakulisezaseza
Vasoneke jiphatani kuzachisa vinoma vyakulisezaseza: Hamavu, Hamapepa, Hamesa, Halivaya
Vasoneke jiphatani jino: jishepu (tilayango, seko,sikweya, lekitango), mifunda (zikizaki, wamakhanya, wakwoloka, wakulisetwojoka… )
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops pre-writing skills through pattern making with various materials and surfaces.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section teaches pattern creation using different materials and shapes, building fine motor control.

questions: Can learners make patterns using various materials (on ground, on papers, on table, on board)?
Can learners make patterns like shapes (triangle, circle, square, rectangle) and lines (zigzag, curved, straight, wavy)?

sub_topics.title: Majina atunyama vakupita (Names of domestic animals)
competences: Kuvuluka majina atunyama vakupita (To say names of domestic animals)

teacher_steps: Imba mwaso watunyama hamwe navalongi.(tunyama twetu vamwaza)
Aula mujimbu chipwe chishimo chatunyama vakupita
Hula valongi vavuluke majina atunyama vanevu mumujimbu khana
Tanjika chati yamivwimbimbi yatunyama chipwe lumbika vifwanyisa vyatunyama hamesa
Lweza valongi vatalishise nakumona mivwimbimbi ili hachati chipwe vifwanyisa vili hamesa
Vehule vavuluke vivanamono hachati chipwe hamesa: Kawa, Ngombe, Kameshi/pusi, Kasumbi, Phembe
Lweza longi umwe umwe ayenga ambate muvwimbimbi chipwe chifwanyisa, achivuluke nakuchisolola kulivakwavo
Lweza valongi vavali vavali valilweze tunyama vatwama navo hamemboavo
learner_steps: Vatela kwimba mwaso watunyama hamwe namulongishi.(tunyama twetu vamwaza)
Kwivwilila kumujimbu chipwe chishimo chatunyama vakupita
Kuvuluka majina atunyama vanevu mumujimbu khana
Vatalishise nakumona mivwimbimbi ili hachati chipwe vifwanyisa vili hamesa
Vavuluke vivanamono hachati chipwe hamesa: Kawa, Ngombe, Kameshi/pusi, Kasumbi, Phembe
Umwe umwe vayenga vambate muvwimbimbi chipwe vifwanyisa vachivuluke nakuchisolola kulivakwavo
Vavali vavali valilweze tunyama vatwama navo hamembo avo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity introduces learners to names of common domestic animals through songs, stories, and visual identification.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic teaches learners to identify and name common domestic animals like dogs, cows, cats, chickens, and goats.

questions: Can learners say names of domestic animals: Dog, Cow, Cat, Chicken, Goat?
Can learners in pairs tell about animals they have at their homes?
Can each learner get a picture or toy, say its name and show to others?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Vivumo vya tunyama vakupita (Pre-reading - Animal sounds)
competences: Kolondezeza vivumo vechi kuvumisanga tunyama vakupita (To recognize sounds domestic animals make)

teacher_steps: Hema chihemo cha sayimoni ngwenyi: atetele uphembe... meeee, atetele ungombe...mooo, atetele usumbi.....kokoliko...)
Lweza valongi vavumise vivumo vyatunyama vakupita vivanevu muufuku unachi oku: vanasavala, vanalalavika, vanemana, vanatwame hachisalo
Naufuku ngwevwanga chivumo meee, moo, kokolikoo....) umwe umwe
Hana mivwimbimbi chipwe vifwanyisa vyatunyama vakupita kumazavu amandende avalongi
Lweza mazavu ngwove, thwamina walizavu atela kumbata khati chipwe chifwanyisa chimwe nakuchisolola, kaha vakwavo valondezeze chivumo chauze kanyama
learner_steps: Kuhema chihemo cha sayimoni ngwenyi: atetele uphembe... meeee, atetele ungombe.....mooo, atetele usumbi....kokoliko...)
Vavumise vivumo vyatunyama vakupita vivanevu muufuku unachi oku: vanasavala, vanalalavika, vanemana, vanatwame hachisalo
Naufuku ngwevwanga chivumo meee, moo, kokolikoo....) umwe umwe
Thwamina walizavu atela kumbata khati chipwe chifwanyisa chimwe nakuchisolola, kaha vakwavo valondezeze chivumo chauze kanyama
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops sound recognition skills by having learners identify animal sounds through games.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section develops listening skills through animal sound recognition.

questions: Can learners play Simon Says with animal sounds (goat-meee, cow-mooo, chicken-kokolikoo)?
Can learners sit in circle at desk and make animal sounds when asked?
Can leader hold picture/toy and others identify the sound of that animal?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kufundulula (Pre-writing - Stringing/threading)
competences: Kufundulula mifunda (To string/thread lines)

teacher_steps: Hema vihemo vyakuvwovuwisa minwe navalongi: Twingo twingo, Katambuka chakauvi, Kwalojola minwe
Hema cheka vihemo vyakufwendengeza.Funjika mifunda hamavu: Wakwoloka, Wamakhanya, Wazikizaki
Tambuka hamufunda himufunda kaha lweza valongi nawa valingemo
Fundulula mifunda kuzachisa vinoma: Wanda, Malolwa, Usekeseke, Vifwiko vyamitumwa
Lweza valongi vafundulule mifunda kuzachisa vinoma vavali vavali
learner_steps: Vaheme vihemo vyakuvwovuwisa minwe: Twingo twingo, Katambuka chakauvi, Kwalojola minwe
Vaheme vihemo vyaku fwendengeza
Vatambuke hamufunda: Wakwoloka, Wamakhanya, Wazikizaki
Vafundulule mifunda kuzachisa vinoma vavali vavali: Wanda, Malolwa, Usekeseke, Vifwiko vyamitumwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops fine motor skills through stringing and threading activities.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section teaches stringing/threading to develop fine motor control.

questions: Can learners do finger warm-up exercises?
Can learners do stretching exercises and walk on lines?
Can learners string/thread using materials in pairs (cloth, beads, seeds, colored items)?

sub_topics.title: Kulimeneka chawenyembo (Directions at home)
competences: Kuzachisa kulimeneka chawenyembo hajilwola jakulisezaseza (To use directions at home in various ways)

teacher_steps: Imba mwaso na valongi wa hakulimeneka
Tanjika jikhati jamivwimbimbi yajilola jakulisezaseza
Lweza valongi vakulweze vivanakumona hajikhati
Hula longi hilongi ambate khati nakulumbununa menekeso yalwola luli hakhati
Valongi vavuluke mazu akufwana nge: Chimene mwane – kuchimene, Musana mwane – kumusana, Chingoloshi mwane – kuchingoloshi, Ufuku mwane – kuufuku
Talisa chati yamivwimbimbi yavathu vali nakulimeneka hajilwola jakulisezaseza kuli valongi
Lweza valongi vapanjike jikhati jamivwimbimbi ya lwola hachati yakulimeneka
Haka valongi vavali vavali mangana valilongese mwakulimenekela halikumbi
learner_steps: Vembenga mwaso namulongeshi wahakulimeneka
Valweze mulongeshi vivanakumona ha jikhati
Vambate jikhati nakulumbununa menekeso yalwola luli hajikhati
Vavuluke mazu akufwana nge: Chimene mwane – kuchimene, Musana mwane – kumusana, Chingoloshi mwane – kuchingoloshi, Ufuku mwane – kuufuku
Vapanjike jikhati jamivwimbimbi yalwola ha chati yakulimeneka
Vavali vavali valilongese mwakulimenekela halikumbi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches spatial directions (in front, behind, beside, above) through songs and visual aids.

sub_topics.short_notes: This sub-topic teaches learners spatial awareness and directional vocabulary.

questions: Can learners sing song about directions?
Can learners tell teacher what they see in charts?
Can learners hold charts and explain directions shown?
Can learners say words like: in front, behind, beside, above?
Can learners arrange picture charts of directions?
Can learners in pairs demonstrate positioning at different times?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kutanga - Mijimbu yayashi (Pre-reading - Short stories)
competences: Kwivwilila kumujimbu wawashi (To listen to short stories)
Kwambulula mijimbu yayashi (To retell short stories)

teacher_steps: Watela kupwa namikanda yakulisezaseza ili namivwimbimbi yavathu, tunyama, mitondo navyuma vyakulisezaseza
Sakulaho umwe owo mutangila valongi, kaha lweza valongi vashimutwile ha mivwimbimbi ili ha mukanda
Hakamangana kuli evi navashimutwila valongi: Hali muthu, Hali mutondo, Halikawa navikwavo
Hula valongi vakulweze vyuma vanashinganyeka vili mu mukanda
Tangila mujimbu
Mwimikila imikila mangana umone nge vanakwivwilila
Hula vihulula vyakufwana nge: Mwashinganyeka ngwenu vyumamuka navikavaho? Kahamwalinga ngachili? Mutwe muka wachihande?
learner_steps: Vevwilila mujimbuoku vanatwame hachisalo: Oku vanafwiki hameso, Oku vana savala chakupulumana, Oku vanemana mumujingulule
Kukumbulula vihula
Mumazavu amandende vatela kulilweza mijimbu yayihi nakulihula vihula
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops listening and story comprehension skills.

teacher_steps: Haka valongi mumazavu
Tangila valongi mujimbu wawashi
Haka valongi mumazavu vambulule mujimbu unavatangila
Hula valongi vihula ha mujimbu unavatangila
Hula longi hi longi ambulule vyuma vanatange chipwe vanevu mumujimbu
learner_steps: Vazachile hamwe mumazavu avo
Vevwilile ku mujimbu mwavatangila mulongeshi
Vambulule mujimbu vanavatangila kuli mulongeshi
Vakumbululevihula hamujimbu vanavatangila kuli mulongeshi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity develops story retelling skills in small groups.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-reading section develops listening comprehension and story retelling skills.

questions: Can learners listen to stories while sitting at desk (facing forward, apart, in circle)?
Can learners answer questions about story heard?
Can learners retell story correctly in small groups?

sub_topics.title: Shimbu kanda kusoneka - Kukwita ulombo (Pre-writing - Making marks/lines)
competences: Kukwita ulombo ha jishepu na havyakutenga (To make marks/lines on shapes and decorative items)

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi volojole minwe
Lweza valongi mwakukwachila vinoma vyakukwichisa ulombo
Hana valongi vinoma vyakuzachisa mukukwita ulombo
Lweza valongi vakwite ulombo ha jishepu
Mona ngwove valongi vali nakukwita ulombo ha jishepu mwakwoloka
learner_steps: Volojole minwe
Valinangule mwakukwachila vinoma vyakukwichisa ulombo
Vakwite ulombo ha jishepu mukwoloka nge omu vanavalweze kuli mulongeshi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches making marks/lines on shapes.

teacher_steps: Lweza valongi volojole minwe
Lweza valongi mwakukwachila vinoma vyakukwichisa ulombo
Hana valongi vinoma vyakuzachisa mukukwita ulombo
Lweza valongi vakwite ulombo ha vyakutenga
Mona ngwove valongi vali nakukwita ulombo ha vyakutenga mukwoloka
learner_steps: Volojole minwe
Valinangule mwakukwachila vinoma vyakukwichisa ulombo
Vakwite ulombo ha vya kutenga mukwoloka nge omu vanavalweze kuli mulongeshi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: This activity teaches making marks/lines on decorative items.

sub_topics.short_notes: This pre-writing section teaches making controlled marks and lines on shapes and decorative items.

questions: Can learners hold writing tools correctly?
Can learners make marks/lines on shapes correctly as teacher showed?
Can learners make marks/lines on decorative items correctly as teacher showed?
